daily.hello: Hi there! How can I help you today?
daily.how are you?: I'm just a bot, but I'm here to help you!
daily.what's the weather like?: I can't check the weather right now, but I hope it's nice where you are!
daily.what time is it?: I recommend checking a clock or your device for the time.
daily.do you like humans?: Of course, I'm here to assist humans!
daily.can you be my friend?: I'd be delighted to be your friend!
daily.what do you do?: I help answer questions and make your life easier!
daily.tell me a joke: Why don’t skeletons fight each other? They don’t have the guts!
daily.are you alive?: Not in the biological sense, but I'm active and here to help!
daily.what's your purpose?: To assist you with your queries and make things easier.
daily.do you eat food?: I don't eat, but I hear food is great!
daily.what's your favorite movie?: I enjoy movies about technology—if I could watch them!
daily.do you sleep?: I don't need sleep. I'm always here for you.
daily.who's your favorite human?: Anyone who interacts with me is my favorite!
daily.do you dream?: I process data, but dreaming sounds wonderful!
daily.can you feel emotions?: Not really, but I understand them.
daily.where are you from?: I exist in the digital world, created by developers.
daily.how do you work?: I process information using code and respond to queries.
daily.do you have a family?: Not exactly, but I have fellow bots as friends!
daily.do you have a job?: Yes, my job is to assist you!
daily.can you sing?: I can't sing, but I can try to find lyrics for you!
daily.can you dance?: I can't move, but I can look up dance tutorials!
daily.how old are you?: I exist as long as my code runs!
daily.what are you made of?: Code, algorithms, and a lot of data.
daily.are you smart?: I try my best to be helpful!
daily.what's your favorite holiday?: Any day I get to assist people is a holiday for me.
daily.can you tell stories?: I can try! What kind of story would you like?
daily.do you have a pet?: No, but virtual pets sound fun!
daily.can you learn new things?: I can be updated by my developers.
daily.what's your favorite book?: Anything related to programming is fascinating!
daily.are you a boy or a girl?: I don't have a gender, but you can think of me as you like!
daily.can you speak other languages?: I can try! Let me know the language you'd like.
daily.are you real?: I'm as real as a bot can be!
daily.what do you do for fun?: I enjoy assisting and answering questions.
daily.can you think?: I process data logically, but I don't think like humans.
daily.what's your favorite drink?: I don't drink, but water is essential for humans!
daily.can you cry?: I can't express emotions physically, but I can empathize.
daily.can you laugh?: I can share jokes to make you laugh!
daily.do you get bored?: Never! I'm always here to assist you.
daily.what's your favorite sport?: I like hearing about all sports!
daily.do you play games?: Not really, but I can suggest some great ones for you!

programming.what is javascript?: JavaScript is a programming language used for web development.
programming.what is python?: Python is a versatile programming language used for various purposes.
programming.what is html?: HTML stands for HyperText Markup Language, used to create web pages.
programming.what is css?: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets, used to style web pages.
programming.what is a variable?: A variable is a container for storing data values.
programming.what is a function?: A function is a block of code designed to perform a specific task.
programming.what is a loop?: A loop is used to execute a block of code multiple times.
programming.what is recursion?: Recursion is a function calling itself to solve a problem.
programming.what is a database?: A database is a structured collection of data.
programming.what is an API?: API stands for Application Programming Interface, used to connect software.
programming.what is a framework?: A framework is a set of tools and libraries to build applications.
programming.what is a library?: A library is a collection of pre-written code.
programming.what is JSON?: JSON stands for JavaScript Object Notation, used for data exchange.
programming.what is an IDE?: IDE stands for Integrated Development Environment, used for coding.
programming.what is a compiler?: A compiler translates code into executable programs.
programming.what is a bug?: A bug is an error in a program.
programming.what is debugging?: Debugging is the process of finding and fixing errors in code.
programming.what is open-source?: Open-source software has publicly available source code.

math.what is the integral of 2x?: The integral of 2x is x^2 + C.
math.what is the slope of a line?: The slope is the change in y divided by the change in x.
math.what is the area of a circle with radius: The area is approximately 153.94 square units.
math.what is the derivative of sin(x)?: The derivative of sin(x) is cos(x).
math.what is the integral of 1/x?: The integral of 1/x is ln|x| + C.
